description:
PydioSync is the desktop client for Pydio v6. It is offers real-time synchronization of a Pydio workspace against a local folder on your computer. Currently, we provide installers for Windows and MacOS, and binaries for Linux as well.

#### Features

* Multi platform support: Mac, Windows, Linux
* Native installers for Mac and Windows
* Great User Experience: configuration wizards
* Real-time synchronisation, manual, or time-based
* Admin allow users to sync a workspace or not
* Ability to sync only a subfolder
* Sync direction: bi-directionnal (standard), upload only (backup), download only (mirror)
* Run sync agent “headless” (without UI) on a remote server – configure via the browser
* Configure many sync tasks against different Pydio servers or workspaces
* Pause/Resume all sync – Temporary disable a task
summary: Real-time synchronization of a Pydio workspace against a local folder on your computer
author: Abstrium SAS
